waves.rationale: US-001 must run first as it establishes the core UI infrastructure (button, modal state, handlers). US-002 explicitly depends on US-001 and will modify the same handlers (handlePageCreated) that US-001 creates. Both stories touch the same task conversation component file.
US-002 depends on US-001 completion and extends the handlePageCreated function created in US-001. Same file modification (task conversation component). Must run serially after Wave 1.

risks: Both stories modify the same component file (task conversation UI)
US-002 extends handlers created in US-001 (handlePageCreated function)
No parallelization possible due to explicit dependency and file overlap
